item.title: AppAdvice Daily: NPR One and Wunderlist 3 are the staff favorites this week
item.description: Need some new apps in your repoitoir? We have you covered on today's Appadvice Daily with NPR One and Wunderlist 3. That's right, we're staying ahead of the NPR news cycle and getting thing done with these two gems. So get ready to start your week off right by watching both apps in action on today's show!

item.title: Today's Must Have Download: Hashtack
item.description: AppAdvice Daily is the best place to get all your app news, reviews and tips.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hashtack is the best way to view all your social network photos in one place.
item.itunes:summary: On today's AppAdvice Daily we are checking out a must have download called Hashtack. Formerly known as Divvy, Hashtack is back with a new name, a new look and tons of new functionality. Hashtack is your one stop shop for all your social network photos. View them all in one place, save them, zoom in, share them, and most importantly, create custom streams using hashtags. It's the ultimate social photo experience. Watch today's AppAdvice Daily to see why this free app should be on your must have list.

item.title: AppAdvice Daily: Instagram's Bolt softly steps onto the App Store but avoids the US
item.description: Instagram first leaked their next app that's being called Bolt last week, and it has now been soft launched in three countries. However don't get too excited, because the US has been left out in the cold, at least for now. Whatch to see what you can expect from the upcoming SnapChat competitor on today's AppAdvice Daily.
item.itunes:subtitle: Instagram’s Bolt Has Been Soft Launched And Coming To US Soon
item.itunes:summary: Don’t miss any app action by watching today’s AppAdvice Daily.
